vague.title: Generic Request
vague.result: Generic component with hardcoded styles, no variants, no accessibility, doesn't match your design system.

engineered.title: Detailed Request
engineered.prompt:
Create a notification component for our React app.

Requirements:
- Variants: success, error, warning, info
- Props: message, type, onClose, autoHide
- Use styled-components with our theme
- Include ARIA live region for accessibility
- Auto-dismiss after 5 seconds if autoHide is true
engineered.result: Production-ready component with all variants, proper accessibility, theme integration, and configurable behavior.

vague.title: Unclear Problem
vague.result: AI doesn't know what bug you're referring to. May make random changes or ask for clarification.

engineered.title: Clear Problem Statement
engineered.prompt:
Bug: Login form submits with empty password field.

Expected: Show validation error 'Password required'
Actual: Form submits, API returns 400

Location: src/components/LoginForm.tsx, handleSubmit function

Fix the validation logic before form submission.
engineered.result: Targeted fix that adds password validation in the correct location, with proper error message handling.

vague.title: Open-ended Request
vague.result: AI may completely rewrite the function, change its behavior, add features you didn't ask for, or break existing functionality.

engineered.title: Constrained Request
engineered.prompt:
Refactor getUserData function.

DO:
- Extract API call to separate function
- Add TypeScript types
- Improve error messages

DON'T:
- Change function signature
- Add new parameters
- Modify return type
engineered.result: Clean refactor that improves code quality while preserving existing behavior and interface.
